name: UFOs (itch)
description:
This game is about shooting UFOs and avoiding asteroids. Your goal is to survive as many waves as you can by shooting down all the UFOs in each waves. Shooting all the UFOs in each wave will allow you progress to the next wave.  After completing the wave, you will have to move towards the portal.

Programmer - William O'Meara

Artist - Vanna Dao

Controls:

W - to accelerate

S - to go reverse

A - to turn left

D - to turn right

Spacebar - to shoot lasers
